Sebut Gas Industri Mahal, Jokowi Minta Menteri ESDM Turun Tangan
02 Nov 2019, 03:00 by Trio Hamdani


Foto: (Andhika Prasetia/detikcom).

Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) memastikan tak ada kenaikan harga gas industri. Hal itu mengonfirmasi keputusan PT Perusahaan Gas Negara Tbk atau PGN membatalkan kenaikan harga gas per 1 November 2019 ini.Jokowi juga memerintahkan Menteri Energi dan Sumber Daya Mineral (ESDM) Arifin Tasrif mengutamakan produksi gas dalam negeri untuk kebutuhan industri lokal, ketimbang diekspor. Arifin diminta Jokowi mengecek kebijakan ekspor gas ke sejumlah negara agar bisa dialihkan juga untuk kebutuhan industri lokal.Mau pandangan lengkap Presiden Jokowi soal harga gas industri? Calling Expensive Industrial Gas, Jokowi Asks the Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources to Dismiss
02 Nov 2019, 03:00 by Trio Hamdani


Photo: (Andhika Prasetia / detikcom).

Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) ensured that there was no increase in industrial gas prices. This confirms the decision of PT Perusahaan Gas Negara Tbk or PGN to cancel the increase in gas prices as of November 1, 2019. Jokowi also ordered the Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources (ESDM) Arifin Tasrif to prioritize domestic gas production for local industrial needs, rather than being exported. Arifin was asked by Jokowi to check the gas export policy to a number of countries so that it could also be diverted to the needs of local industries.
